column1: He stretched his long frame comfortably in the deep leather chair as he explained that the gentleman in question was his mother's grandfather, a roistering old sea - dog by the name of Joshua Probert, more inclined to raising Cain than crops.

column1: You 'd be quite comfortable, I assure you,’ the man went on, and by his pleading tone Breeze guessed that his employer was used to having his own way — and raised Cain when he didn't get it.
